item.title: Camera Powers Lens-Coupled High-Speed X-Ray Imager
item.description: Allied Vision's EoSens 1.1CXP2 high-speed CMOS camera selected as the core imaging engine for a new real-time 4D X-ray CT system.

item.title: Harnessing AI to Detect Anomalies During Aircraft Wing Manufacture
item.description: Loughborough University's AVRRC develops AI-based anomaly detection using synthetic data to augment human inspection in aircraft wing manufacturing.

item.title: Flir Launches Long-Life Cooled Thermal Cameras
item.description: Flir introduces the A6450 Long-Life Cooled MWIR Cameras, purpose-built for continuous industrial automation and non-destructive testing.

item.title: Nikon Launches Enhanced Microscope Portfolio
item.description: Nikon Corporation releases new ECLIPSE microscope models to strengthen its industrial microscopy solutions range.

item.title: Specim Unveils High-Speed NIR-SWIR Hyperspectral Camera
item.description: Specim launches the FX19, a high-speed NIR-SWIR hyperspectral camera designed for industrial machine vision applications from 1130â€“1920 nm.

item.title: NanoFocus AG Becomes Wholly Owned Subsidiary of Mahr Group
item.description: Mahr Group completes the acquisition of NanoFocus AG, integrating its surface metrology technology into Mahr's portfolio.

item.title: Techkon USA and Sun Chemical Launch SunQ Quality Software
item.description: Techkon USA and Sun Chemical introduce SunQ, a quality software integrating color and physical testing with SAP for standardized ink production protocols.
